text: Wayne Manor is the home of Gotham City billionaire Bruce Wayne / Batman and his butler Alfred Pennyworth. It appears in American comic books published by DC Comics. The manor was the childhood home of Bruce when his parents were alive. The Manor was part of the Wayne's family for generations. Under the manor is the Batcave or Batman's lair.Architectural Blueprints of Archetypal TV Homes ==References== ==Other websites== *Wayne Manor Category:Batman Category:Fictional buildings and structures
title: Wayne Manor
